name: Klede movie
description:
Our game challenge your vision and movie knowledge by offering you blured movie posters and make you choose between 4 movie titles
in order to pass to the next level you have to complete all posters from the previous level
Please enjoy and have fun


Disclaimer:
All movie posters and titles are taken from the TMDB API under the license
https://www.themoviedb.org/documentation/api/terms-of-use
